theShooter:Shield_Generator.NAME: Shield Generator
DESCRIPTIONS: Only take 1 damage each hit on the first turn of combat. NL Tracks whether or not you've lost hp this combat.

theShooter:StrongThruster.NAME: Strong Thruster
DESCRIPTIONS: You have a 40% chance to dodge attacks on the first turn of combat

theShooter:HullBreach.NAME: Hull Breach
DESCRIPTIONS: Vulnerable and lose 2 HP as well.

theShooter:Broken_Weapons.NAME: Broken Weapons
theShooter:Broken_Weapons.FLAVOR: Maybe you should get that checked out.

theShooter:AnotherQuarter.NAME: Another Quarter
DESCRIPTIONS: If you die while you are Wealthy, spend 250 gold to heal to 100% HP.

theShooter:BackDoor.NAME: Back Door
theShooter:BackDoor.FLAVOR: I'll flip a few switches for you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, if you are Healthy, remove all debuffs.

theShooter:DarkHull.NAME: Dark Hull
DESCRIPTIONS: You are always Masterful, no matter how much damage you take.

theShooter:DarkStar.NAME: Dark Star
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies start with 4 Fading. NL Warning!! NL The Transient will have a much longer timer!

theShooter:NiftyWrench.NAME: Nifty Wrench
DESCRIPTIONS: Automatically play 0 and 1 cost powers for free when you draw them.

theShooter:InertiaCradle.NAME: Inertia's Cradle
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose 30 Evasion at the start of your turn instead of all of it.
